channel.title: Create A WOW Podcast
channel.description: A collection of interviews and presentations by industry experts helping you learn to create your own WOW online
channel.itunes:author: Marnie Pehrson
channel.itunes:summary: Create your own WOW online. Learn from industry experts on Search Engine Optimization, Pay per Click advertising, Copywriting, Article Marketing, Press releases, branding and naming, shopping carts, goal setting, mindset and more!
channel.itunes:subtitle: Virtual Create A WOW Conference - experts discuss article pr, seo, ppc, branding, press releases, joint ventures, blogging, customer service, LinkedIn, and more

item.title: Dogs and Generals Talk About Leadership
item.description: Tracey Jones, President of Tremendous Life Books, talks about Kindle sales from a publisher's perspective as well as their latest two leadership books - one written by Blue the dog and the other which is a compilation of interviews with 4 star generals and admirals.
item.itunes:author: Marnie Pehrson
item.itunes:summary: Tracey Jones, President of Tremendous Life Books, talks about Kindle sales from a publisher's perspective as well as their latest two leadership books - one written by Blue the dog and the other which is a compilation of interviews with 4 star generals and admirals.
item.itunes:subtitle: Two hot new leadership books

item.title: Purpose Driven Publishing
item.description: Tracey Jones, President of Tremendous Life Books, shares her journey toward becoming the president of a major personal development book publishing house. Get a look inside the purpose-driven mission of a publishing house that sells books by the truck-load to corporations and contributes hundreds of thousands of dollars a year to worthy causes.
item.itunes:author: Marnie Pehrson
item.itunes:summary: Tracey Jones, President of Tremendous Life Books, shares her journey toward becoming the president of a major personal development book publishing house. Get a look inside the purpose-driven mission of a publishing house that sells books by the truck-load to corporations and contributes hundreds of thousands of dollars a year to worthy causes.
item.itunes:subtitle: Exclusive Interview with Tracey Jones, President of Tremendous Life Books

item.title: Growing Up as the Daughter of a Famous Motivational Speaker
item.description: Tracey Jones, President of Tremendous Life Books, talks about what it was like growing up as the daughter of well-known motivational speaker, Charlie "Tremendous" Jones, the importance of books, and the impact they can make on our lives.
item.itunes:author: Marnie Pehrson
item.itunes:summary: Tracey Jones, President of Tremendous Life Books, talks about what it was like growing up as the daughter of well-known motivational speaker, Charlie "Tremendous" Jones, the importance of books, and the impact they can make on our lives.
item.itunes:subtitle: Tracey Jones talks about her father Charlie "Tremendous" Jones

item.title: My Dot People with Kirk Duncan
item.description: Marnie Pehrson interviews Kirk Duncan about his "My Dot People" program, a unique take on spiritual warfare. Learn to distinguish the difference between the voices in your head -- which ones are you and which ones are the "Dot People?"
item.itunes:author: Marnie Pehrson
item.itunes:summary: Marnie Pehrson interviews Kirk Duncan about his "My Dot People" program, a unique take on spiritual warfare. Learn to distinguish the difference between the voices in your head -- which ones are you and which ones are the "Dot People?"
item.itunes:subtitle: A unique take on spiritual warfare

item.title: Body Language with Kirk Duncan
item.description: Marnie Pehrson of IdeaMarketers.com interviews body language expert, Kirk Duncan, about the importance of body language in communication. Discover body language tips and find out about Kirk's free body language show.
item.itunes:author: Marnie Pehrson
item.itunes:summary: Marnie Pehrson of IdeaMarketers.com interviews body language expert, Kirk Duncan, about the importance of body language in communication. Discover body language tips and find out about Kirk's free body language show.
item.itunes:subtitle: Why Body Language Matters

item.title: How to Create a Product Funnel

item.itunes:summary: How to create a product funnel or what Multiple Income Streams expert, Milana Leshinsky calls a multiple income streams tree. (15 minutes)

item.title: How to Leave a Voice Mail That Get's Noticed
item.description: Some of the most common etiquette mistakes are made when leaving voice mail messages. Business etiquette expert, Cynthia Lett explains how to leave the best voice mail message.
item.itunes:author: Marnie Pehrson
item.itunes:summary: Some of the most common etiquette mistakes are made when leaving voice mail messages. Business etiquette expert, Cynthia Lett explains how to leave the best voice mail message.

item.title: The Best Way to Get Off the Company Softball Team
item.description: Your company has a softball team and you really don't want to play. Cynthia Lett, business etiquette expert, explains the best way to get off the team.

item.itunes:summary: Your company has a softball team and you really don't want to play. Cynthia Lett, business etiquette expert, explains the best way to get off the team.

item.title: Who am I and Why Am I Here?
item.description: Have you ever asked ''Who Am I? Why am I here?'' Tom Wolf of Identity and Destiny talks about the tough questions in life and how to find your life purpose.
item.itunes:author: Marnie Pehrson
item.itunes:summary: Have you ever asked ''Who Am I? Why am I here?'' Tom Wolf of Identity and Destiny talks about the tough questions in life and how to find your life purpose.

item.title: What Is The Purpose Of Life?
item.description: Why is it so important to understand your purpose in life? Does each individual on the earth really have a special purpose and if so, how does one discover it? Tom Wolf of Identity and Destiny answers these questions and more.
item.itunes:author: Marnie Pehrson
item.itunes:summary: Why is it so important to understand your purpose in life? Does each individual on the earth really have a special purpose and if so, how does one discover it? Tom Wolf of Identity and Destiny answers these questions and more.

item.title: Multiple Income Streams: Stop Trading Hours for Dollars

item.title: Business Etiquette: Where to Sit?
item.description: How do you know where to sit at a business dinner for proper business etiquette? What about when sitting in a taxi or limo? Where should each person sit for proper etiquette? Cynthia Lett, business etiquette expert, explains proper seating etiquette.
